help-file.title: "WATER MAGUS"
help-file.content:
The Water Magus concentrates on utilizing the healing powers of the element of water. His affinity with this element allows him to breathe underwater and to automatically conjure water for his use at will. Yet, he is not without offensive abilities.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Waterbreath, Conjure Water
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 7th circle: Water to Life 8th circle: Dread Wave
